attributes.review:
At first, I thought this app would be AMAZING to download, but soon I realized I was wrong. Shortly after I downloaded this, my Facebook and E-mail got hacked. I am deeply disturbed and dissatisfied. I expected better from you, Trump. 

Sincerely, Melinda, an Ex-Trump Supporter.
attributes.title: I cannot believe I actually considered downloading this

attributes.review: As a trump supporter I very much disliked this. So I need to share my feed to other supporters! I have recently received info that this app just hacks your phone and is fake! So don’t download this app because all it does is hack you and leak your private information!!
attributes.title: JUST HACKS YOU!

attributes.review: its a horrible app! Nobody should ever have to download something this glitchy. It’ll literally completely wipe your phone! apple store please remove this before more people have to deal with this super horrible glitchy app.
attributes.title: don’t download 🤢

attributes.review: This is a super bad app did not download and if you do you rated one star and delete it right away please do not download this you’re just wasting your time and wasting storage do not vote for him in please don’t download it thank you for reading bye
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: Without getting too political here, I’d like to say that this app is so unorganized and hard to use. I have nothing against Trump or anything it’s just that he did a horrible job designing it.
attributes.title: Not organized and very all over the place

attributes.review: Took 5 hours to download blank screen showed up saying error to load, refreshed it and went back in for it to tell me sorry try again later what kind app is this 1 Star all the way
attributes.title: By far worst app ever

attributes.review: so it all started when i first downloaded this app everything was going smooth till the cheeto mans app “trump” app was harassing me!!! if i could give this one star i would my phone almost exploded because i wouldn’t give him my social security number he is sick do not vote for him for president !!!! he is expired !!!! even my alexa started to turn against me because of the cheeto mans app. i am convinced she is going to get me in my sleep 😢🤯😳😤😫.. i am begging cheeto man stop the madness !!!
attributes.title: don’t trust the cheeto man !!!

attributes.review: I downloaded the app because i wanted to see what our racist, homophobic, sexist president has to offer and as i tapped the screen my thumbs slowly became orange and it started to spread throughout my body, eventually leaving me to look like the man himself😔IT WAS HORRIFYING and i do NOT RECOMMEND!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP🤮🤮will leave you orange

attributes.review: I downloaded this to to support my Cheeto puff president. Took 365 days to download🥺 once it finished downloading, the app glitched and staring sending all my ñüdęš to my contacts😭✨✨. For🧚in🧚er🧚🥬 anyways I hope this app gets deleted because it hacked my phone.
attributes.title: why this app isn’t worth it

attributes.review: This app is very dangerous be careful on what you click on it will give you a virus and steal all your social media passwords and hack into them I had to reset my passwords on multiple apps because of it if you have this app delete it now!!!!
attributes.title: This app is not good bad !!!
